name: Figure-8 Motion Demo
description: Demonstrates NonPhysicsObject with custom JavaScript animation creating a figure-8 pattern

functionCalls.code: globalNonPhysicsEngine.animateObject('figure_8_ball', { code: 'const a = 5; const b = 3; mesh.position.x = a * Math.sin(time); mesh.position.y = 5 + b * Math.sin(time) * Math.cos(time); mesh.position.z = 0;' }); return [];
